text: The Swordsman is a 1974 British action film directed by Lindsay Shonteff and starring Linda Marlowe, Alan Lake and Edina Ronay.BFI.org It was a sequel to the 1973 film Big Zapper and follows the adventures of a female private detective named Harriet Zapper.Sheridan p.99 It was produced in 1974, including location shooting in the South of France around Nice. In 1976 it was picked up for release on the Odeon Circuit by Rank Film Distributors.Gifford p.865 ==Cast== * Linda Marlowe as Harriet Zapper * Alan Lake as Reynaud Duval * Jason Kemp as Karel Duval * Tony Then as Hock * Edina Ronay as Guy Champion * Noel Johnson as Christian Duval * Peter Halliday as Rabelais * Michael O'Malley as Gendarme * Graham Ashley as Bar-fly * William Ridoutt as Inspector Cook * David Robb as Alex Zendor ==References== ==Bibliography== * Denis Gifford.
